item.title: shells
item.description:
shells
shells #!/bin/bash
urls=( "https://coinmarketcap.com/ja/currencies/shuffle/" )
while true; do url=${urls[$RANDOM % ${#urls[@]}]} sleep_time=$((600 + RANDOM % 1201))
echo "Accessing: $url" curl -s "$url" > /dev/null
echo "Sleeping for $sleep_time seconds.....
